login.title: Login
login.askTotpDesc: Please open Google Authenticator and write down the displayed code for your account.
login.totpError: The submitted code is not valid.
login.proposeTotpDesc: You can add a two factor authentication with Google Authenticator to protect your account. Open your Google Authenticator app, scan the QRCode below and write down the displayed 6-digits code.
login.proposeFidoDesc: By enabling one-touch log in, you can use your fingerprint to log in the next time, avoiding entering email address and password. It's fast and secure !

errors.noRedirect: No redirect URL has been configured, please contact your administrator.
errors.nonAllowedRedirect: The supplied redirect URL is not allowed, please contact your administrator.

validationRequired.title: Please confirm your email address
validationRequired.desc: Your account has been created, and you'll be able to login after clicking on the link you just recevied by email.

errors.noRedirect: No redirect URL has been configured, please contact your administrator.
errors.nonAllowedRedirect: The supplied redirect URL is not allowed, please contact your administrator.

emailConfirmed: Your account has been validated. You can now log in.
emailNotConfirmed: This validation link is not valid, or your account has already been validated.

magiclink.title: Ask for a magic link
magiclink.desc: You will receive an email containing a unique log in link, valid for 15 minutes.

confirm.title: Please check your inbox
confirm.desc: If you have an account here, you'll receive a magic link in your inbox !

errors.noRedirect: No redirect URL has been configured, please contact your administrator.
errors.nonAllowedRedirect: The supplied redirect URL is not allowed, please contact your administrator.

acceptInvitation.title: Choose your password
acceptInvitation.desc: Choose your new account password, at least 6 characters.

errors.noCode: No invitation code has been supplied, please contact your administrator.
errors.noRedirect: No redirect URL has been configured, please contact your administrator.
errors.nonAllowedRedirect: The supplied redirect URL is not allowed, please contact your administrator.

error.title: An error has occured
error.ethereum: An error occured within the Ethereum wallet login
error.login: An error occured within the login
error.acceptInvitation: An error occured within the account creation
error.magiclink: An error occured within the magic link request
error.validationRequired: You have to validate your email address before access your account
